name: Honki's Journey
description:
Honki's Journey is an adventure puzzle game where the player's goal is to finish the required tasks in each level and proceed to next one. Honki's dog Gaia has been kidnapped by the bad guys and it is up to you as a player to rescue him. You must dodge the deadly traps and finish the puzzle patterns in order to reach the island castle where Gaia is held. A challenging surprise is waiting adventurers in the halls of the castle.

Controls:

WASD for movements.

Mouse for looking around.

Left click for throw rocks.

LeftShift for run.

E button for pick up the boxes.

*This made for educational purposes (Karo, Erkush34, Barissotti)
